Package com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes

Class TeamBattleMiniGame

java.lang.Object
com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.MiniGame
com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.TeamBattleMiniGame
public abstract class TeamBattleMiniGame extends MiniGame
[Info]
- Minigame frame players battle with each teams
- min team count: 2 or more
- all teams have the same score
- team util class, methods

[Custom Option]
- group-chat: If true, send message only to team members (default: true)
- team-pvp: If true, team members can not attack each other(pvp option have to be set to true), (default: true)
- team-size: Related with MiniGameSetting.getMaxPlayerCount(), if "max-player-count" is 12 and "team-size" is 4 then, 3 teams are created automatically

[Team Register Mode]
- Participants divied into teams when game starts with mode
- See TeamBattleMiniGame.TeamRegisterMode

[Rule]
- Create Teams with createTeams()
- When use initGameSettings(), must call super.initGameSettings()
- If need different team types, override createTeams() without "super.createTeams()" and create custom teams (e.g. Boss player team vs challengers team) (recommended creating teams with teamSize())
- If use TeamRegisterMode.NONE, should register players to team with registerPlayersToTeam()

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    TeamBattleMiniGame.Team
    Team which used in TeamBattleMiniGame frame
    Manage: teamName, maxMemberCount, members, color
    static class 
    TeamBattleMiniGame.TeamRegisterMode
    Team register mode
    - Participants divied into teams when game starts with mode
    - If use TeamRegisterMode.NONE, should register players to team with registerPlayersToTeam()

    [Team Register Mode]
    - NONE, FAIR, FILL, FAIR_FILL, RANDOM or can divide overriding "registerPlayersToTeam()"

    - e.g.

    • isLessThanPlayersLive

      protected boolean isLessThanPlayersLive()
      Counting unit changed: "player" to "team"
      [IMPORTANT] Must override MiniGame.isLessThanPlayersLive(), because will be checked in MiniGame.checkGameFinishCondition() and MiniGamePlayerData.setLive(boolean)
      Overrides:
      isLessThanPlayersLive in class MiniGame
      Returns:
      True if MiniGame.getLivePlayersCount() is less than MiniGameSetting.getGameFinishConditionPlayerCount()
